original_text: When you meet together, two or three people should speak a message from God. Then the other people there should think carefully about each message. When you meet together, two or three people should speak a message from God. Then the other people there should think carefully about each message.
korean_text: 예언하는 자는 둘이나 셋이나 말하고 다른 이들은 분별할 것이요

sentences.original_text: two or three people should speak a message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 두세 사람이 하나님의 말씀을 전해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: should think carefully about each message
sentences.korean_translation: 각 메시지에 대해 신중히 생각해야 합니다
